attributes.action: Full Disclosure of NHS Front-Line Cuts
attributes.additional_details: When the NHS reforms were announced by the coalition government, the public were told "no front-line cuts".  However, nurses up and down the country are being told their jobs are in danger, and that redundancies are "inevitable".  We demand full disclosure as to how many front line staff are to be cut, in order to inform a full and open debate on the dangers of this government's plans for the NHS.
